prompts: Create a mythical bird Pokemon with vibrant feathers and powerful wings.
Design an electric-type Pokemon that has a striking color pattern and fierce appearance.
Show me a legendary creature that soars through the skies and commands thunder.
Imagine a majestic flying Pokemon with bright colors and a distinctive beak.
Generate a Pokemon known for its speed and agility, adorned with colorful plumage.
Make an electric and flying hybrid Pokemon with feathers that resemble lightning bolts.
Give me a legendary Pokemon with a fierce look and an electrifying presence.
